languages.text: "У нас есть общий враг, предвечный враг, пожирающий все живое. Разве не видели мы уже его слуг на Лилэтане и не только?"

traits.locale_text: "У нас есть общий враг, предвечный враг, пожирающий все живое. Разве не видели мы уже его слуг на Лилэтане и не только?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "We have a common enemy, an eternal enemy, one that devours all living things. Have we not already seen its servants on the Lilaethan and elsewhere?"
languages.original_text: "У нас есть общий враг, предвечный враг, пожирающий все живое. Разве не видели мы уже его слуг на Лилэтане и не только?"

traits.locale_text: "We have a common enemy, an eternal enemy, one that devours all living things. Have we not already seen its servants on the Lilaethan and elsewhere?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We have a common enemy, an eternal enemy, one that devours all living things. Have we not already seen its servants on the Lilaethan and elsewhere?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We have a common enemy, an eternal enemy, one that devours all living things. Have we not already seen its servants on the Lilaethan and elsewhere?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We have a common enemy, an eternal enemy, one that devours all living things. Have we not already seen its servants on the Lilaethan and elsewhere?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我们有着共同的敌人，一位永恒的敌人，一位吞噬一切生灵的敌人。我们不是已经在莉莱赞和其他地方见过它的仆人了吗？”
languages.original_text: "We have a common enemy, an eternal enemy, one that devours all living things. Have we not already seen its servants on the Lilaethan and elsewhere?"

traits.locale_text: “我们有着共同的敌人，一位永恒的敌人，一位吞噬一切生灵的敌人。我们不是已经在莉莱赞和其他地方见过它的仆人了吗？”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Tenemos un enemigo común y eterno que busca devorar todo cuanto vive. ¿Acaso no nos encontramos con sus siervos en el Lilaethan y en otros lugares?».
languages.original_text: "We have a common enemy, an eternal enemy, one that devours all living things. Have we not already seen its servants on the Lilaethan and elsewhere?"

traits.locale_text: «Tenemos un enemigo común y eterno que busca devorar todo cuanto vive. ¿Acaso no nos encontramos con sus siervos en el Lilaethan y en otros lugares?».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「我々には共通の敵がいる。あらゆる生き物を食い尽くす外敵。リラエタンやその他の場所で、すでにその従者たちを見ただろう？」
languages.original_text: "We have a common enemy, an eternal enemy, one that devours all living things. Have we not already seen its servants on the Lilaethan and elsewhere?"

traits.locale_text: 「我々には共通の敵がいる。あらゆる生き物を食い尽くす外敵。リラエタンやその他の場所で、すでにその従者たちを見ただろう？」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Wir haben einen gemeinsamen Feind, einen ewigen Feind, der alles Leben verschlingt. Sind wir seinen Dienern nicht auf der Lileath und anderswo bereits begegnet?"
languages.original_text: "We have a common enemy, an eternal enemy, one that devours all living things. Have we not already seen its servants on the Lilaethan and elsewhere?"

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben einen gemeinsamen Feind, einen ewigen Feind, der alles Leben verschlingt. Sind wir seinen Dienern nicht auf der Lileath und anderswo bereits begegnet?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Nous avons un ennemi commun, un ennemi éternel, qui dévore toutes les créatures vivantes. N'avons-nous pas déjà rencontré ses serviteurs sur la lilaethan et en dehors ? »
languages.original_text: "We have a common enemy, an eternal enemy, one that devours all living things. Have we not already seen its servants on the Lilaethan and elsewhere?"

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons un ennemi commun, un ennemi éternel, qui dévore toutes les créatures vivantes. N'avons-nous pas déjà rencontré ses serviteurs sur la lilaethan et en dehors ? »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ortak ve ebedî bir düşmanımız var: Tüm canlıları yutan bir düşman. Bu düşmanın hizmetkârlarıyla Lilaethan'da ve başka yerlerde karşılaşmamış mıydık zaten?"
languages.original_text: "We have a common enemy, an eternal enemy, one that devours all living things. Have we not already seen its servants on the Lilaethan and elsewhere?"
